data.title: VIA Metropolitan Transit
data.meta_description: From single ride and daily tickets to month-long passes, VIA offers a variety of affordable fare options to get you where you want to go in San Antonio.
data.text:
VIAtrans

VIAtrans riders, their personal care attendant, and a companion (with VIA ID) ride bus and special event service free.

Transfers

Free transfers, which allow you to connect from one bus to another, must be purchased when boarding and are valid for 2.5 hours from the time indicated. If transferring from a regular service to Express Service, additional fare is required.

Discounts

Discounts are available to children 5-13, seniors age 62 or older, Medicare recipients, persons with certain disabilities, active-duty U.S. military, and students. Find out more detailed information regarding discounts and reduced fares.

Off-Peak Special

Seniors and riders with limited mobility can ride bus service for just 25 cents from 9 a.m. to 3 p.m. on weekdays and free all day on weekends (with VIA ID).

Fare Assistance Program

VIA now offers a Fare Assistance Program to service area non-profit, social service and governmental/public agencies serving low income clients and/or clients living below the federal poverty level. Eligible 501 (c) (3) organizations can purchase monthly, weekly and daily bus passes, VIA Link, and VIAtrans tickets in bulk less 25% less the value of the passes. To see if your organization qualifies for the program, or need additional information, contact VIA’s Customer Relations Division At 210-362-2310.

Online Application

Download Application.

31-Day Pass

The 31-Day Pass is valid for unlimited rides on all regular, Express, Prímo, and VIA Link service for 31 days from activation. The half fare 31-Day Pass is available for riders who qualify for reduced fares. The pass is activated by inserting it in the farebox on the first ride. After that simply swipe and go.

Back to Fares

Semester Pass

The Semester Pass is valid for unlimited rides on all regular, Express, Prímo, and VIA Link service for the entire semester. The spring Semester Pass is valid January 1 to July 31. The fall Semester Pass is valid August 1 to December 31. Semester Passes cannot be purchased online. Get more information about fares for students.

Back to Fares

7-Day Pass

The 7-Day Pass is valid for unlimited rides on all regular, Express, Prímo, and VIA Link service for seven days from activation. The half-fare 7-Day Pass is available for riders who qualify for reduced fares. The pass is activated by inserting into the fare box on the first ride. After that, simply swipe and go.

Back to Fares

Annual Pass

The Annual Pass is valid for unlimited rides on all regular, Express, Prímo, and VIA Link service for one calendar year (12 months). The pass is available as full fare only at VIA Information Centers and will be loaded onto a goCard. The yearly pass is valid for 365 days, from the date of activation (first use).

Back to Fares

Day Pass

The Day Pass is valid for unlimited rides on all regular, Express, Prímo, and VIA Link service on the day of activation. The half-fare Day Pass is available to riders who qualify for reduced fares. Day Passes are sold on the bus. Passes purchased in advance are activated by inserting into the fare box on the first ride. After that, simply swipe and go.

Back to Fares
